algorithm_technique: Modulo arithmetic to simulate array state over time
problem_summary_simple: Determine the element at a given index and time in a cyclically changing array.
problem_summary_technical: Simulate array transformations using modulo arithmetic on time and index to find the element at query time.
key_insights: The array's state repeats every 2 * len(nums) minutes due to removal and re-addition.
The effective time `t % (2 * len(nums))` simplifies the problem.
The logic checks if the element at `indexj` is still present or has been re-added based on the effective time.
